did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Carbon typescript with author's holograph corrections. Chapter 15 is holograph manuscript; chapter 14 is missing. Accompanied by portraits and illustrations with holograph notes.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: The Apache Indians (AZ 190). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Author and lecturer; University of Arizona Professor of English Literature, 1916-1918, Head of English Dept., 1920-1941.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into narrative sequence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Carbon typescript with author's holograph corrections. Chapter 15 is holograph manuscript; chapter 14 is missing. Accompanied by portraits and illustrations with holograph notes.

item.subject: Indians of North America -- Arizona -- History.
